All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App1
Data Entry System with arrays as storage space in disk.
App2
Data Entry System with files as storage space in disk.
App3
Data Entry System with MVC architecture with files as storage space in disk.
Bachelor
A class that supports student record for Bachelor student
BachelorView
Provides Input Panel view for Bachelor Student.
EntryView
Window for user interactions.
IncompleteFieldsException
Exception raises if any input field is empty.
Master
A class that supports student record for Master student
MasterView
Provides Input Panel view for Master Student.
ObjectStorage
Stores records as individual objects in file.
PhD
A class that supports student records for PhD students
PhDView
Provides Input Panel view for PhD Student.
RecordController
Controller class from MVC architecture that controls Model and View.
RecordEntry
Provides methods to create student records and to print the student records
Scientist
A class that supports student record for Scientist
ScientistView
Provides Input Panel view for Scientist Student.
Student
Represents a student in the data entry system.
StudentManager
Manages Students, files and storage interactions.
TableView
Window for showing the records in the form of tables.
